abstract: Follow along for live analysis and updates throughout Game 5 of the American League divisional series between the Yankees and the Tigers.
snippet: Follow along for live analysis and updates throughout Game 5 of the American League divisional series between the Yankees and the Tigers.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees' dreams of a 28th World Series title were dashed Thursday, as they were eliminated from the playoffs in a 3-2 loss to the Detroit Tigers.
